title: Login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can login successfully using valid credentials through Supabase authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to application login page
Enter a valid registered username/email and password
Click on the login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on role

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails and an appropriate error message is displayed when incorrect credentials are used.

steps.description: Navigate to application login page
Enter an invalid username/email or password combination
Click on the login button
Verify login is rejected and a clear error message is shown

title: Student edits practice end date and saves changes
description: Verify that a student can successfully edit the end date of a practice and that the changes persist correctly in the database.

steps.description: Login as a student user
Navigate to the Student Dashboard and access their practices table
Edit the end date field of an active practice
Save the changes
Verify that the updated end date is displayed in the UI
Verify the updated end date is persisted in the backend database

title: Admin views calculated total hours for student
description: Verify the admin interface correctly calculates and displays total practice hours for each student.

steps.description: Login as an administrator user
Navigate to the Students Editor interface
Open a student record with multiple associated practices
Verify that total hours shown match the sum of individual practice durations
Verify total hours update correctly when student’s practices are changed

title: Filtering institutions by agreement state with correct tag rendering
description: Verify that the institutions listing can be filtered by agreement states and corresponding tags are rendered correctly.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Navigate to Institutions Editor page
Apply filters on institution list by different agreement states
Verify list updates to show institutions matching the filter
Verify that institution entries correctly display state tags visually

title: Complete CRUD operations for students
description: Verify administrator is able to create, read, update, and delete student records with correct validations and UI updates.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Navigate to Students Editor
Create a new student with valid data and save
Verify the new student appears in the list
Edit an existing student’s information and save
Verify changes are reflected correctly
Delete a student record
Verify the student is removed from the list
Attempt to create student with missing required fields
Verify validation errors are displayed preventing submission

title: Complete CRUD operations for practices
description: Verify administrator can create, view, update, and delete practice records including student and institution assignment.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Navigate to Practices Editor
Create a new practice, assign student and institution, then save
Verify the new practice appears in the practice list with correct details
Modify an existing practice’s details and save
Verify practice details are updated correctly
Delete a practice record
Verify practice is removed from the list

title: Complete CRUD operations for institutions
description: Verify administrator can create, read, update, and delete institution records including agreements and orientations management.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Navigate to Institutions Editor
Create a new institution with required information and save
Verify the institution is listed with correct details
Update an existing institution’s agreement and orientation data
Verify updated data is reflected correctly
Delete an institution record
Verify institution is removed from the list

title: Submit and manage practice application requests
description: Verify students can submit practice applications and administrators can view, approve, or reject these requests correctly.

steps.description: Login as student
Navigate to available convocatorias and submit a practice application
Verify application appears in student’s request list with correct status
Login as administrator
Open the applications management interface
Approve or reject a student’s practice request
Verify the application's status updates accordingly

title: Smart Analysis AI alerts and recommendations
description: Verify the AI-driven Smart Analysis component generates relevant alerts and recommendations based on data.

steps.description: Login as administrator or authorized user
Navigate to the Smart Analysis dashboard or component
Verify that alerts and recommendations appear consistent with current data scenarios

title: Data persistence and synchronization from UI changes
description: Verify that changes in the UI such as edits to practices or student records update the database and UI reflects those updates immediately.

steps.description: Login as admin or student depending on context
Modify data fields in the UI (practices, students, institutions)
Save changes
Verify changes are updated and persisted in the database
Verify UI data refresh to reflect saved changes

title: Interface responsiveness and usability compliance
description: Verify the application UI is responsive on various screen sizes and meets defined usability and accessibility guidelines.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile resolutions
Verify all key UI components render properly without overflow or misalignment
Verify interactive elements are accessible and usable across devices

title: Handle invalid practice end date inputs
description: Verify that the system prevents entry of invalid end dates for practices (e.g., end date before start date) and shows validation errors.

steps.description: Login as student
Open practice editor and attempt to set an end date before the start date
Try to save the changes
Verify validation error is shown and changes are rejected

title: Security: prevent access to admin features for students
description: Verify that student users cannot access administrative interfaces and receive an appropriate permission denied message or redirect.

steps.description: Login as student user
Attempt to access admin only pages via direct URL navigation or UI
Verify access is denied or user is redirected to an allowed page

title: Security: session timeout and logout
description: Verify that inactive sessions expire after a configured timeout and the user is logged out requiring re-authentication.

steps.description: Login as any user
Remain inactive for the maximum session timeout period
Attempt to perform an action after timeout
Verify user is logged out and prompted to login again
